title: Help to identify an alternative please
content:
Hi there all.

I have found this blackletter typeface which looks great, but it has been styled with distressed edges which I don't like. Please can someone help identify a similar blackletter font that has similar characteristics, specifically the extra stroke that follow the black filled parts of the letters. In an ideal world I would like the same font but with hard, computerised edges as oppose to the hand rendered look.

Many thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Blackletter with double stroke.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100528/http:/typophile.com/files/Blackletter%20with%20double%20stroke.png) | 173.32 KB |
author: doj

comments.content:
I think this belongs here: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100528/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

hhp
